Title: Relates to establishing a toll exemption for certain residents of the central business district
Summary: Establishes a toll exemption for residents of the central business district who have a household income less than or equal to one hundred twenty percent of the median income.
LawCode: Amd ยง1704-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a toll exemption for certain residents of the central business district
